about.title: Leadership in Providing Diverse Facilities
about.description: ScavaRent is a leading entity under the Scelvera Group, specialized in providing diverse facilities within the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. We operate under a professional vision based on quality, reliability, and excellence in the smallest details. We offer integrated value carefully designed to keep pace with the aspirations of major projects, high-end events, and government and private sectors.
about.benefit1Desc: For us, quality is not an option; it's a work culture we adhere to at every stage.
about.benefit2Desc: We bridge planning, execution, and follow-up within a practical framework that guarantees efficiency.
about.benefit3Desc: Years of experience give us a deep understanding of the unique needs of every project.
about.benefit4Desc: We operate according to a well-studied plan that ensures performance efficiency across all our projects.
about.storyText: ScavaRent was born from an ambitious vision that believes the value of details is what creates success, and that facilities are not just temporary spaces, but an essential element in the success of any project or event. Since our launch, we have set distinctive goals to provide a unique experience that elevates the standards of facility rental in Saudi Arabia, reflecting the quality you deserve.
about.mainHeadline: ScavaRent Where True Values Are Made
about.feature1Desc: All facilities comply with the approved standards in the Kingdom.
about.feature2Desc: A specialized team is present to handle any inquiry.
about.feature3Desc: Diverse facilities to suit various projects and events.

FAQ.title: FAQ
FAQ.subtitle: Common Questions
FAQ.description: Have questions about booking or managing a facility? Here are the most common answers.

items.question: How do I book a facility through the platform?
items.answer: Simply select the desired facility, choose an available date and time, then confirm your booking via online payment for instant confirmation.

items.question: Can I cancel or reschedule my booking?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule through your dashboard. Refund policies apply based on the time remaining before the booking starts.

items.question: What do the facility rental fees include?
items.answer: Fees vary by facility, but usually include lighting, air conditioning, and the basic amenities listed in the facility description.

items.question: How can I ensure the facility's quality and cleanliness?
items.answer: We conduct periodic quality checks, and you can view real user reviews, ratings, and up-to-date photos of the facility.

items.question: Can I list my own facility for rent?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can register as a 'Facility Provider' and upload your space details and photos to start receiving bookings and generating revenue.

FaqPage.mainSubtitle: Find answers to the most common questions
FaqPage.rentA1: Yes, after booking confirmation you receive it by email.
FaqPage.rentQ2: Can We Reschedule The Rent Date?
FaqPage.rentA2: Yes, you can reschedule 24 hours before your booking.
FaqPage.rentQ3: Can We Rent More Than One Facility?
FaqPage.rentA3: Absolutely, multiple facilities can be booked at once.
FaqPage.rentQ4: What Do We Need To Rent A Facility?
FaqPage.rentA4: You need a valid ID and payment method.
FaqPage.hostQ1: How To Register As A Host?
FaqPage.hostA1: You can sign up using the Host Registration form.
FaqPage.hostA2: Yes, hosts can modify listing details anytime.
FaqPage.paymentA1: We support Visa, MasterCard, and digital wallets.
FaqPage.paymentA2: Yes, all transactions are encrypted and secure.
FaqPage.policiesA1: Refunds are available up to 48 hours before your booking date.
FaqPage.policiesA2: No hidden fees, only standard taxes may apply.
